TopicTitle: anyone that can help me with this crash??

Articles.Content:
hi,i have an issue on my modded install. Its a crash issue that acures at vessel loading and happens about 25% of the time

this is the log:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/xlp56lgio6t1bki/AABzR9M7inUmoM4kqdlDQpaaa?dl=0

thanks beforhand

Ive had lots of crashes since installing B9, I have heard it pushes the 32bit limit on its own!

I am not willing to go to 64 bit until I find out how to avoid the KSC issue where it pops up fully upgraded.

Most likely (in my experience) a memory issue with a modded install.
Do you have Active Texture Manager installed? If you don't, your game will run out of memory and crash.
